channel.title: Extra Love Love Paradise
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Extra Love Love Paradise" - and Stealth Suit, Love Love Paradise, Necklace

item.title: Re: Extra Love Love Paradise
item.content:encoded: Ok, I'm no longer loop locked and now I'm able to drop my spare codec into the stash. If no one has doubled up on any runes, and is willing to trade, I might consider a chakra armor or something that will sell for some ryo.

item.title: Re: Extra Love Love Paradise
item.content:encoded:
All I have in terms of runes is 4 worthless runes and 1 wolf rune. I don't think anyone wants the worthless runes, and I'm not going to trade the wolf rune.

Fireworks Launcher- +4 Nin Levels, -1 Gen and Tai Levels

It's not bad. It weakens your Gen and Tai, though. I'm half expecting a new set of items to eventually come around that'll give the Gen and Tai equivilants of the launcher, which would amount to +2 levels all around.

I really wish I'd help with Tai instead, though. Tai's my weakest stat, and it'd be nice to make it on par with the others.

Still, having +18 Nin levels is nice. :)

Edit: Update on items I have to trade:

1 Spare Necklace of the First Hocage
2 Spare Love Love Paradises
2 Spare Stealth Suits
2 Spare Fireworks Launchers

Edit2: Fixed a typo.

item.title: Re: Extra Love Love Paradise
item.content:encoded:
… The codec seems to be REALLY rare or something :)

My Love Love Paradise still up for a codec ;) and what are the stats of a Firework Launcher?

item.title: Re: Extra Love Love Paradise
item.content:encoded: What I would really like is to trade my codec for some of the appraised runes. However I have no real idea of their present/apparent worth.

item.title: Re: Extra Love Love Paradise
item.content:encoded:
Bumping this thread, and adding an update to what I have to trade.

1 Spare Necklace of the First Hocage
2 Spare Love Love Paradises
2 Spare Stealth Suits
1 Spare Fireworks Launcher

Also, if a trade hasn't taken place between Arkantos and Schon I'm certainly willing to trade any of these for a Codec (or any Super Rare, really, but preferrably a Codec).

Same offer to anyone, of course.

item.title: Re: Extra Love Love Paradise
item.content:encoded: LOL I only still need the Codec… for collection purpose too x) the rest I already have…

item.title: Re: Extra Love Love Paradise
item.content:encoded:
Yes, I do, but if Arkantos wants to trade, then go with him first.

I can't say I attack…. at all. And even if I did, I have a range of 22, 20, and 19 respectively without team, so I'm not exactly lacking range (and I've still got the monochrome range items to get).

I'd like the Codec, but more for collection purposes than anything.

I should also note what I currently have to trade:

1 Spare Love Love Paradise
1 Spare Necklace of the First Hocage
2 Spare Stealth Suits

item.title: Re: Extra Love Love Paradise
item.content:encoded: I do xD and I also have a spare Love Love paradise…

item.title: Re: Extra Love Love Paradise
item.content:encoded:
Sure. It's in the Storehouse now, so whenever someone's on to give you permissions, you can take it.

Just drop the Necklace in the storehouse whenever.

Edit: Nevermind, I see you've already dropped it in.

item.title: Re: Extra Love Love Paradise
item.content:encoded: Oop, I'd like to trade for the love love paradise instead >.> just ended up winning a stealth suit.

item.title: Re: Extra Love Love Paradise
item.content:encoded: I've got an extra necklace of the first hokage that I'd like to trade for one of those stealth suits if you'd be willing.

item.title: Re: Extra Love Love Paradise
item.content:encoded:
Giving this topic a bump to a.) draw attention to it again, and b.) add that I have now acquired a third Stealth Suit.

So, if anyone has an extra Codec and is willing to trade, I'd still really like to do a trade.

Also, if anyone needs a Stealth Suit, I'd really like to get rid of one of these, so if there's anything you can trade, even if I already have the item, I'd be willing to do a trade.

I still have the extra Love Love Paradise as well, and if anyone wants to trade for that, I can do a trade with that too…. just please no stealth suits. (I'll still trade anyway, but… >.<)

item.title: Extra Love Love Paradise
item.content:encoded:
Alright, I got pretty lucky with the wheel again, and I landed a second Love Love Paradise. Since I have no use for it, I'm offering a trade.

The only Super-rare that I currently lack is the Codec. If anyone has an extra, I'd very much like to trade for that.

If no one has a Codec, then I am willing to trade for any of the other Super-rares. It really doesn't make any difference to me whether I have two Love Loves or two Headbands, and if it'll help someone else, then I'm willing to do that.

Otherwsie, I'll just hold onto it. It's really not worth selling after the cut to sell values, especially since I still have over 600,000 ryo left after winning the Sevens Trophy. Or I may donate it to the village, I'm not really sure.

Anyway, if anyone's interested, just post here.
